price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߘߏ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߏ߬ ( ߟߎ߬ ) ߞߐ߫ ߛߊ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
